mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no,d.dept_name,p.position_name,e.password,e.emp_name,e.emp_tel,e.emp_sign FROM employee e, department d ,position p where e.dept_no=#{deptNo} and e.position_no=#{positionNo} and d.dept_no=e.dept_no and p.position_no=e.position_no

select d.dept_name, p.position_name, e.emp_name, e.emp_no from employee e, department d, position p where e.dept_no=d.dept_no and e.position_no = p.position_no and e.position_no >= 0 and (e.emp_name like '%' || #{seach} || '%' or e.emp_no like '%' || #{seach} || '%' or p.position_name like '%' || #{seach} || '%')
mapper.update: update employee set position_no=0 where emp_no=#{value}

select d.dept_name, p.position_name, e.emp_name, e.emp_no from employee e, department d, position p where e.dept_no=d.dept_no and e.position_no = p.position_no and e.position_no > 0 and d.dept_name=#{value}
